item.title: Worli is the trendy spot in Mumbai
item.description:
Worli, situated at the entrance of South Mumbai, is gaining popularity as Mumbai’s top luxury neighborhood. The Park, a property development located in this central area, generated over â‚¹250 crore in a single weekend, according to developer Lodha Group. Source: Lodha Group. Mrs. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, prospective President and Brand Ambassador for The Park, a 17-acre residential project by the Lodha Group. Lodha states that Worli has transformed into a business center with numerous offices and corporations headquartered there...

item.title: VyprVPN from Golden Frog now includes a server in Mumbai
item.description:
Golden Frog, a company dedicated to online privacy and internet accessibility, has expanded its services to India. This new server, located in Mumbai, marks the company’s 14th in Asia and aims to provide Indian internet users with a secure and unrestricted online experience through their VyprVPN service. “India, with its vast population and rapidly growing tech sector, will benefit greatly from this new server location,” says Sunday Yokubaitis, President of Golden Frog...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/vyprvpn-from-golden-frog-now-includes-a-server-in-mumbai/

item.title: Google has introduced free Wi-Fi at Mumbai Central Station and launched the Indic keyboard app
item.description:
Source: Google Asia Pacific blog. Beginning January 22nd, individuals passing through Mumbai Central station in India will have access to complimentary, high-speed Wi-Fi provided by Google. This service is part of an initiative revealed in September 2015 to bring high-speed public Wi-Fi to 400 train stations across India. Collaborating with Indian Railways, which manages one of the world’s most extensive railway systems, and RailTel, a provider of internet services as RailWire through its fiber network along many railway lines, Google’s Access & Energy team aims to equip 100 of India’s busiest stations with Wi-Fi by the end of 2016, with the remaining stations to follow shortly after...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/google-has-introduced-free-wi-fi-at-mumbai-central-station-and-launched-the-indic-keyboard-app/

item.title: Etihad introduces A380 flights connecting Abu Dhabi and Mumbai
item.description:
Etihad Airways, the national airline of the UAE, will begin operating its Airbus A380 aircraft between Abu Dhabi and Mumbai starting May 1, 2016. This comes after the successful introduction of the A380 on routes to Sydney and, beginning in June 2016, Melbourne. The airline’s 496-seat A380, based in Abu Dhabi, offers 50% more seating capacity than the Boeing B777-300ER it is replacing. This allows Etihad to provide more travel options and boost tourism between India, the US, and Abu Dhabi...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/etihad-introduces-a380-flights-connecting-abu-dhabi-and-mumbai/

item.title: Grand Hyatt Mumbai reveals its plans for New Year's Eve
item.description:
The Grand Hyatt Mumbai, a premier Hyatt International property and a central hotel for Mumbai, Pune, and Goa, is hosting multiple New Year’s Eve celebrations. Starting at 7 pm, guests can enjoy the Grand Courtyard Party. This event features dancing under the stars, drinks, and desserts for INR 3,500 plus taxes. At 7 pm, several dining options are available. Soma offers North West Frontier cuisine with vegetarian and non-vegetarian choices. Celini provides Italian cuisine, while China House serves a Chinese-themed dinner...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/grand-hyatt-mumbai-reveals-its-plans-for-new-year-s-eve/

item.title: Etihad announces first destinations for Airbus A380 and Boeing 787 Dreamliner aircraft
item.description:
Etihad Airways, the national airline of the United Arab Emirates, has announced the initial destinations for its new Airbus A380 and Boeing 787 Dreamliner aircraft. Source: Etihad. The Boeing 787-9. The Abu Dhabi-based airline will start flying its first A380 to London’s Heathrow Airport in December 2014, with a second A380 added to the same route in the first quarter of 2015. By the end of 2015, Etihad Airways will have five A380s in service, with plans to also introduce them on routes to Sydney and New York’s JFK Airport...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/etihad-announces-first-destinations-for-airbus-a380-and-boeing-787-dreamliner-aircraft/

item.title: Starting in October, Air China will offer nonstop flights from Beijing to Mumbai
item.description:
Air China will commence nonstop flights between Beijing and Mumbai starting October 25, 2015. This decision comes as a response to the growing travel demand between these two BRICS nations, driven by strengthening political and economic ties. Source: Air China. The route will operate four times a week, with flights on Tuesdays, Thursdays, Saturdays, and Sundays. The seven-hour journey departs Beijing at 7:40 PM local time and arrives in Mumbai at 1 AM the following day...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/starting-in-october-air-china-will-offer-nonstop-flights-from-beijing-to-mumbai/
